name: files.upload
desc: This method allows you to create or upload an existing file.

content.desc: File contents via a POST var.

initial_comment.desc: Initial comment to add to file.

channels.desc: Comma-separated list of channel names or IDs where the file will be shared.

errors.posting_to_general_channel_denied: An admin has restricted posting to the #general channel.
errors.invalid_channel: One or more channels supplied are invalid.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
errors.invalid_array_arg: The method was passed an HTTP-style array argument, which is never valid with the Slack API.
errors.request_timeout: The method was called via a POST request, but the POST data was either missing or truncated.
